title: The Sims 4 [Repack]
description:
Release Date: September 4, 2014
Genres/Tags: Artificial life, Managerial, God sim, 3D
Developer: Maxis
Publisher: Electronic Arts
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: in-house

Interface Language: English, Spanish, French, German, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese
Audio Language: Simlish
Crack: built-in (RELOADED)

Minimum requirements:
Operating System: Windows XP (SP3)
Processor: 1,8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon 64 Dual-Core 4000+ or better
RAM: 2 GB
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 / ATI Radeon X1300 or better
DirectX: 9.0c
HDD Space: 22 GB 

Repack Features:
-- Based on The.Sims.4.City.Living.INTERNAL-RELOADED ISO release: rld-sims4cl.iso (19,928,776,704 bytes)
-- The.Sims.4.Update.v1.29.69.1020, The.Sims.4.Update.v1.30.10.1010 & The.Sims.4.Update.v1.30.105.1010 installed over, missing localization files added
-- 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
-- All DLCs, add-ons & bonus soundtrack included
-- Updated to latest version v1.30.105.1010
-- NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
-- No Origin installation required for running
-- All 17 languages available
-- Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 24.4 to 14.4 GB)
-- Installation takes from 15 minutes (8-cores CPU) to 45 minutes (2-cores CPU)
-- HDD space after installation: 22 GB
-- After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
-- Use "Language Selector.exe" in game's "GameBin" folder to change the game language
-- If you don't have DLCs or the game closes with Origin error: close "Origin", allow the game EXEs access to Internet and run it as admin
-- Repack uses pZlib library by Razor12911
